![](https://greenkvm.com/home/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/7thbirthday-scaled.jpg"")


We – [**GreenCloudVPS**](https://greencloudvps.com/ "GreenCloudVPS") have been on the market for 7 years and we appreciate your contribution to our success. That is why on our 7th birthday we would like to celebrate this with you, our dearest clients, with up to **50% OFF LIFETIME DEALS!**

I. GET **50% OFF RECCURRING** on all **[NVMe Windows](https://greencloudvps.com/nvme-windows-vps.php "NVMe Windows")** and **[NVMe KVM VPS](https://greencloudvps.com/nvme-kvm-vps.php "NVMe KVM VPS")** with the semi-annual, annual, biennial and triennial payments

`Code: BIRTHDAY50`

II. GET **40% OFF RECCURRING** on all [**Windows VPS**](https://greencloudvps.com/windows-vps.php "Windows VPS") & **[KVM VPS](https://greencloudvps.com/kvm-vps.php "KVM VPS")** with the semi-annual, annual, biennial and triennial payments

`Code: BIRTHDAY40`

All these codes are applicable from **5th October – 12th October 2020**. Hope you will enjoy this celebration just like we do!

**We do have other promotions running on https://greenkvm.com with great discounts too.**

Current customers can contact us to apply the discount for current services if you extend them for the eligible discounted period. These promotions could not be combined with other/existing promotions.
